description.narrative: (i) Contribution to Employment: The Company employs over 4,000 workers, composed primarily of women. The Companys continued expansion will ensure it maintains the current level of workers, despite the switch to automated machines. (ii) Farmer Linkages: The Company purchases over 90 million liters of raw fish sauce from approximately 400 fishermen based in Phu Quoc Island. The Companys continued expansion of their fish sauce operations will increase their purchases to over 140 million liters annually from approximately 600 local fishermen. (iii) Consumer Benefits: The Companys focus on providing healthy and safe products has enabled the consumer healthy and safe alternatives which did not exist before the Company entered the fish sauce, soy sauce and instant noodle markets. The Company plans to continue to introduce products which are healthier and safer than products currently available to the Vietnamese consumer. (iv) SME Linkages: The Companys products are sold in nearly 100,000 small and medium size retailers through over 100 independent distributors. The Companys products generate significant profits for these retailers and distributors of between 5-15%, or approximately US$10 million in 2008.

Masan Group Corporation (Masan Group or the Sponsor) is the parent company of Masan Food Corporation (the Company or Masan Food). Masan Group is seeking long-term financing primarily to expand and upgrade Masan Foods operations, as well as meet long-term working capital needs, and enter into other agribusiness ventures, either through acquisition or organic growth (the Project). Masan Food is a branded packaged food-and-beverage company based in and with nationwide distribution throughout Vietnam. Established in the late 1990s, the Company has established recognizable local brands for soy, instant noodles, fish and chili sauces. Headquartered in southern Ho Chi Minh City, the Company operates four production facilities and five distribution centers across Vietnam. The Company has focused on developing products with higher health and safety standards than the products currently available on the market.

name.narrative: Masan Food is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City. The Company operates three main factories in Tan Binh Industrial Park (Ho Chi Minh City), Tan Dong Hiep Industrial Park (Binh Duong province) and Dai An Industrial Park (Hai Duong province). The factory in Tan Binh IP will be relocated to extended factory in Tan Dong Hiep IP within the next two years. Besides, the Company has a small factory in Phu Quoc island producing raw fish sauce.
